meanings.definition: A person who studies the oceans.
meanings.sent1: Oceanologists explore the sea to learn more about it.
meanings.sent2: Many oceanologists work on research ships to study marine life.
meanings.sent3: The oceanologists found a treasure map while studying the ocean depths.
meanings.sent4: She dove into the world of knowledge like a fearless oceanologist.
meanings.sent5: The oceanologists' passion for the sea was as deep as the ocean itself.

meanings.sent1: Studying oceanography helps us understand the ocean better.
meanings.sent2: Oceanologists use advanced technology to research ocean currents.
meanings.sent3: During the oceanologists' conference, they discussed new findings in marine science.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an ocean of knowledge, just like that of an oceanologist.
meanings.sent5: The oceanologists' dedication to their field was as vast as the ocean they studied.
